courses.title: Beginner Guitar Essentials
courses.description: Learn the basics of acoustic and electric guitar playing, including chords, strumming, and beginner songs.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: A structured course for newcomers to piano, covering music theory, basic techniques, and simple compositions.

courses.title: Intermediate Music Theory
courses.description: Explore scales, chord progressions, harmonies, and analysis techniques used in modern and classical music.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of digital audio production using Ableton Live. Includes mixing, effects, and arrangement.

courses.title: Advanced Vocal Training
courses.description: For experienced singers looking to refine technique, expand range, and improve performance skills.

courses.title: Drumming Basics
courses.description: Introduction to rhythm, drumming patterns, and techniques for beginners using a standard drum kit.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of improvisation through jazz standards, scales, and theory. Ideal for instrumentalists and vocalists.

courses.title: Electronic Music Composition
courses.description: Compose original electronic tracks using DAWs, synthesizers, and audio plugins.

courses.title: Sight Singing and Ear Training
courses.description: Develop the ability to read music at sight and identify intervals, melodies, and rhythms by ear.

courses.title: Film Scoring Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand the process of scoring music for film and media, from spotting to composing and syncing audio.
